entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
